reviews.review: 생존자도 살인마를 즉처하게 해달라! 생존자에게도 즉처권을 달라!
Мало того что игра мусор с кучей доната, так разработчики ещё и россиянам купить игру не дают, идите нахуй с таким отношением.

Скажу одно, игра точно стоит своих денег и приятно проводить время вместе с друзьями.
Благодаря этой игре можно найти новых друзей, можно побомбить на мана, но и повеселиться от души. Не знаю как у вас ребят, но я благодаря этой игре я встретил такого человека, который сейчас мне очень близок и мне такого жесть как не хватало, надеюсь, вы тоже найдете себе друзей в этой игре. Просто как по мне, главное тут не завоевать 1 ранг, хоть на сурве или мане, главное это общение, тут мы развиваемся, общаемся, понимаем и злимся друг на друга, можно еще много всякого сказать. Я знаю что вы скажете, "Есть много других игр, где так же есть общение, почему выбирать именно эту?"
Ля, люди, мне откуда знать, хотите сказать, что я выбирал эту игру намеренно? Нет. Вы просто не представляете, на сколько крута история, как я встретил человека своей мечты, что уже скоро буду с ним жить(Я говорю про девушку, с которой я уже пол года отношений, вы не подумайте что я гей или т.д, просто понимаю, что это не суть). Вам выбирать во что играть, я выбрал эту игру и мне повезло. Я понимаю, что у многих из вас цель будет не найти там девушку, новых друзей, потому что думаете, что это глупо. Так когда я сам же покупал эту игру, не думал об этом. Не было цели найти это. Она сама нашла меня, все было очень да же случайно) Играть ли вам в эту игру?) Сами выбирайте, у каждого человека свой вкус на игры, но мое мнение об этой игре самое, что не наесть, лучшее. Хочется сказать спасибо, что я потратил 400 рублей на эту игру, а получил все, что нужно для этой жизни.

Хотите получить бесконечное ожидания загрузки в лобби? а если не загрузитесь то жать  alt+f4? потом тиметый и маньке которые играют ради выполнения заданий? В игре с каждым обновлением все больше и больше багов, разработчки делают все что бы в игру было не возможно зайти, эта игра не стоит своих денег и потраченого времяни играя в нее.  Ни кому не рекомендую эту игру, а если она у вас есть то соболезную

Cooles Game, gibt nur viele doofe Spieler....

The Binding of Kin review: Don't buy it, BHVR has knowingly released a killer who's abilities don't work along with perks on both sides that do not work either. And this is with PTB data and even comments from Fog Whisperers to the Devs themselves. And with the release of the chapter, even more bugs have appeared. It's become abundantly clear that the devs do not care about the gold mine they're sitting on, the viciously loyal community this game has due to streamers, and would rather release cosmetics to milk the money from this game rather than balance the game AND more importantly: Fix the stability and latency issues that have plagued this game for years. The review below is still concurrent to the state of the game and nothing has changed sadly and ALL of these issues still remain in the game. 




I'm re-reviewing this game as I took 6-7 months off and came back recently. Before, I recommended this game for its fun factor and its simplicity. No longer anymore as this game becomes not fun after your 40th hour for a multitude of reasons. First and foremost is the community if you can really ever call it that, 99% of the people who play this game on PC are the biggest cry babies whether its survivors or killers. However most of the biggest cry babies come from the survivors themselves as killers will often find, and as someone who plays both sides I find it hilarious. Survivors will be constantly shitting on new killers on their play-style and perks, assuming they play PC as we are the only ones that can access and view the post game chat. Survivors will complain that killer perks are op, if certain perks are used you're a "trash" player, etc which leads to the next issue. 

B A L A N C I N G. Its no secret that survivors have had the game tipped in their favor but with just enough wiggle room to allow Killers to still be a relevant role that's picked. Perks that have been added to survivors since Stranger Things chapter have ever so slowly given survivors a better position when in game. The same can't be said for Killers who have been in a VERY sticky situation with their perks and even the characters themselves. The non DLC vanilla Killers you get are useable but only to a certain extent. Almost all of them require add-ons to actually be viable against the survivors that have stuck around still in this game. Their base abilities, while very appealing, offer so many counters that its frustrating. Hell you NEED add-ons for the Trapper to even stand a chance. Ruin, being nerfed, isn't a bad thing however but it leads straight to the next issue

Map Design:  Midwich, Haddonfield, and Springwood, that's all Im saying. 

Graphics: Not too bad, I like the new graphical rework but hilariously enough this leads to an issue that still stands by months after my first review

Latency: During the Middle Ages, this game was P2P. Peer to Peer connection was a mixed bag as barely any games in this day and age had P2P connections, which means you're at the mercy of the host of the game. 98% of the time you got games that were 80-140 ms and 2% was below 40 ms. Players cried for dedicated servers and with great points too, and a lot of us hoped that DS's would solve connectivity issues. 2019 rolled around, we got dedicated servers and found that somehow it made it worse. Since the rollout of dedicated servers, random lag spikes are frequent to where they're detrimental to a game. Doing a skill check? Whoopsie fuck your skill check here's some lag. Running from a killer and using dead hard? UH OH STINKY HERE'S SOME LAG. Opening a chest peacefully? Here's a red lag item. Unhooking a survivor? GET LAG. The rollout of dedicated servers has brought on a whole host of problems that are now amplified. Odd hit boxes, weird netcode, actions not being rendered on screen, terrible hit registration, lag spikes, etc. How the fuck do you roll out dedicated servers and still manage to cock it all up?

Is the game fun? Sure. Once you get past the rampant toxicity of this game, there's a game that requires no skill at all that's waiting for you. The truth is that everyone is bad at this game in their own way, and that Survivor or Killer rank on the upper right hand corner of your screen doesn't matter because its easy to rank up and get to Rank 1 easily (though the system makes no sense to me still). Its fun but abusive like the state I govern. 

This game is Suffolk County approved and not NY approved. As Governor of NYS, I would ban the shit out of this game if I could to prevent anyone from losing their sanity.

Played this game yesterday for the first time. I sort of knew about the game by watching on twitch but never really got into it. My friend convinced me to buy the game and all I can say at this time, is why didn't I buy this game sooner?

I haven't played a hunter yet but I've played 5 hours so far of survivors and I got to say, the game gets really intense as you try to sneak, flee, and hide from the hunter. Dodging and weaving around avoiding which ever boss is trying to attack you is truly heart pounding at times. 

The only issue I had with the game is that one time during the five hours, the game got stuck on the loading screen and I had to ALT-TAB out. Only client issue I've had so far. Also, I wish there was a TOGGLE button for crouch instead of HOLD to crouch. Other than that, I really enjoy this game and I would definitely recommend this game to my friends and others.

****EDIT****

After a copious amount of hours into this game, I highly recommend it. The game is constantly being updated and new content is always coming out. This game is extremely fun with custom lobbies and is also fun in solo ques. 10 out of 10 would recommend.

This game would be fun if other players did not intentionally disconnect ever time they are hit or downed. Too many times I have to play multiple rounds JUST to get a complete game.  Between long lobby waits and disconnects, it has become too tough to have a good time. And the hate in post game chat. OMG so mean and the use of profanity.

Ну, наконец то наиграв приличное количество часов, могу с гордостью заявить, что  каждый вечер я ползаю по парковке и пытаюсь починить генераторы.

Очень печалит, что народ не приобретает маньяков и играя за выжившего, ты рискуешь играть 9\10 игр против долбанного трапера.

Игра за выживших так не впечатляет, как за убийцу (азарта не хватает)

Играя против хорошей команды из выживших и понять не успеешь как они запустили все генераторы, насрали в твой маньячеловский подвал, порвали тебе жЁппу  и  с песней - пляской убежали  с уровня. 

К этом сегменту игры пришел после Пятницы 13, где меня абузили по кд и дырявили голову из ружья.  Здесь иногда чувствуешь себя полноценным кровожадным убийцей.

Dead by Daylight, is in my opinion, a game where most of your motivation and pleasure comes from Spiting the opponent. Whether it's the slightly hysteric glee of saving your fellow survivor from the hook and tanking a blow from the Killer to help both of you to escape, or the sadistic, vindictive glee of slaughtering the little worms who thought that their arrogance would go unpunished, the game is very emotional. This emotion becomes very apparent when the opponent doesn't want to allow you to have fun, abusing overly powerful perks or abilities or just playing like nothing is sacred to them. Yet i still return to this game. The game has it's issues, sure, but this game can honestly be very fun. The only question is, do you have the patience to grind to the fun part.

Pese a quien le pese, el mejor juego multijugador de survival horror. El clásico juego del ratón y el gato, con sus fallos y sus aciertos, adornado con un estilo artístico bastante bueno, y lleno de licencias del terror slasher. En los últimos meses ya ha adoptado un sistema de servidores dedicados que aunque mejorable, trae la estabilidad suficente y un sistema de progresión y cosméticos a la altura de los mejores triple A. Cómpralo sin dudar si te gusta el slasher, las partidas emocionantes o jugar con amigos.
